content: this was named because the pattern was a right little pucker to get right also because it puckers obviously mosaic pattern sock for the ska february 2012 sockdown please note that i have provided 3 different sizes but only size m has been knitted so far and only by myself so no guarantees any problems or questions please do not hesitate to contact me 26/02/2012 i have made a very small change to the text in the pattern concerning the start of the instep pattern contact me if you run into problems
